turns.speaker: client

turns.text: what type of pizzas did you want?

turns.text: ok, and what toppings did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the second pizza, I want pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the third pizza, I want meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier

turns.speaker: cashier

turns.speaker: cashier
